description: With a record of 1-2 on NK, Shane Erickson is ready to improve his stats. He's back bigger and stronger than before, and his cumshot is still crazy as ever. Brand new to the mat is Kyle Sparks. He has some Tae Kwan Do training but he is not familiar with the dirty fighting style on NK. This is also his first time being on video. Does he have what it takes to be an NK fighter?
title: Shane Erickson vs Kyle Sparks
